entry.title: GYM 101173B Bipartite Blanket
entry.content:
GYM 101173B Bipartite Blanket

Hall 定理直接应用

Hall 定理：
二分图中在同部图的点集 SSS 有完美匹配当且仅当对于 SSS 的子集 TTT，与 TTT 里的点有直接连边的点的集合 N(T)N(T)N(T)，有 ∣T∣≤∣N(T)∣|T|\le |N(T)|∣T∣≤∣N(T)∣

这部分可以直接对于左右部图状压求解每个点集是否有完美匹配

同时还有个性质：
若左部图有点集 SSS 满足有完美匹配，右部图有点集 TTT 满足有完美匹配，则 S+TS + TS+T 也有完美匹配

所以记录下左右部图有完美匹配的点集用二分或双指针求解即可

# include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int N = 20, M = 1 << 20;
int mL [N], mR [N], wL [N], wR [N];
int tot1 [M], NL [M], NR [M], valL [M], valR [M], fL [M], fR [M];
vector <int> L, R;
int main () {
	int n, m;
	scanf ("%d %d", & n, & m);
	for (int i = 0; i < n; ++ i) {
		for (int j = 0; j < m; ++ j) {
			int c;
			scanf ("%1d", & c);
			if (c) {
				mL [i] |= (1 << j), mR [j] |= (1 << i);
			}
		}
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < n; ++ i) {
		scanf ("%d", & wL [i]);
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < m; ++ i) {
		scanf ("%d", & wR [i]);
	}
	int Mx;
	scanf ("%d", & Mx);
	for (int i = 0; i < max (1 << n, 1 << m); ++ i) {
		tot1 [i] = tot1 [i >> 1] + (i & 1);
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < (1 << n); ++ i) {
		fL [i] = 1;
		for (int j = 0; j < n; ++ j) {
			if ((i >> j) & 1) {
				fL [i] &= fL [i ^ (1 << j)], valL [i] += wL [j], NL [i] |= mL [j];
			}
		}
		fL [i] &= (tot1 [i] <= tot1 [NL [i]]);
		if (fL [i]) {
			L .push_back (valL [i]);
		}
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < (1 << m); ++ i) {
		fR [i] = 1;
		for (int j = 0; j < n; ++ j) {
			if ((i >> j) & 1) {
				fR [i] &= fR [i ^ (1 << j)], valR [i] += wR [j], NR [i] |= mR [j]; 
			}
		}
		fR [i] &= (tot1 [i] <= tot1 [NR [i]]);
		if (fR [i]) {
			R .push_back (valR [i]);
		}
	}
	sort (R .begin (), R .end ());
	long long ans = 0;
	for (int l : L) {
		ans += R .end () - lower_bound (R .begin (), R .end (), Mx - l);
	}
	printf ("%lld", ans);
	return 0;
}

entry.title: LibreOJ 2146 「SHOI2017」寿司餐厅
entry.content:
LibreOJ 2146 「SHOI2017」寿司餐厅

有正贡献有负贡献，还有“选了 iii 就必须选 jjj”的约束，那就很明显是个最大权闭合子图了

情况 1⁡\operatorname{1}1，对于 1≤i≤j≤n1\le i\le j\le n1≤i≤j≤n，选了区间 [i,j][i, j][i,j]，就会得到 wi,jw_{i, j}wi,j​ 的贡献
对区间 [i,j][i, j][i,j] 建点 si,js_{i, j}si,j​，若 wi,j≥0w_{i, j}\ge 0wi,j​≥0，连边 (S⁡,si,j,wi,j),(si,j,T⁡,0)(\operatorname {S}, s_{i, j}, w_{i, j}), (s_{i, j}, \operatorname {T}, 0)(S,si,j​,wi,j​),(si,j​,T,0)；若 wi,j<0w_{i, j} < 0wi,j​<0，连边 (S⁡,si,j,0),(si,j,T⁡,−wi,j)(\operatorname {S}, s_{i, j}, 0), (s_{i, j}, \operatorname {T}, - w_{i, j})(S,si,j​,0),(si,j​,T,−wi,j​)

情况 2⁡\operatorname {2}2，对于 1≤i<j≤n1\le i < j\le n1≤i<j≤n，选了区间 [i,j][i, j][i,j] 就必须选对于 i≤l≤r≤ji\le l\le r\le ji≤l≤r≤j 的区间 [l,r][l, r][l,r]
很明显是一个“选了 iii 就必须选 jjj”的约束，注意这里不用把全部边建出来，只需要建边 (si,j,si+1,j,inf⁡),(si,j,si,j−1,inf⁡)(s_{i, j}, s_{i + 1, j}, \operatorname {inf}), (s_{i, j}, s_{i, j - 1}, \operatorname {inf})(si,j​,si+1,j​,inf),(si,j​,si,j−1​,inf)，其他的区间只需往下走就可以走到

情况 3⁡\operatorname {3}3，对于 1≤i≤n1\le i\le n1≤i≤n，设区间 [i,i][i, i][i,i] 选了 ccc 次，则有 −c×ai- c \times a_i−c×ai​ 的贡献
挺显眼的，wi,i←wi,i−aiw_{i, i}\leftarrow w_{i, i} - a_iwi,i​←wi,i​−ai​ 即可

情况 4⁡\operatorname {4}4，对于 i=a1∼ni = a_{1\sim n}i=a1∼n​，若选了 >0> 0>0 次 iii 则有 −m×i2- m\times i^2−m×i2 的贡献
再对每个种类 iii 新建一个节点 pip_ipi​，贡献为负，所以连边 (S⁡,pi,0),(pi,T⁡,m×i2)(\operatorname {S}, p_{i}, 0), (p_{i}, \operatorname {T}, m\times i ^ 2)(S,pi​,0),(pi​,T,m×i2)
同时对于 1≤j≤n1\le j\le n1≤j≤n 的区间 [j,j][j, j][j,j] 和 aja_{j}aj​ 也有“选了 iii 就必须选 jjj“的约束，连边 (sj,j,paj,inf⁡)(s_{j, j}, p_{a_{j}}, \operatorname {inf})(sj,j​,paj​​,inf)

求解最大权闭合子图即可

# include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int inf = 1e8;
const int N = 11000 + 100, M = 44000 + 100;
int Ev [M * 2], Ext [M * 2], Ew [M * 2];
int Eead [N];
int Etot = 1;
void EaddL (int u, int v, int w) {
    Ev [++ Etot] = v, Ew [Etot] = w, Ext [Etot] = Eead [u], Eead [u] = Etot;
    return ;
}
void Eadd (int u, int v, int w) {
    EaddL (u, v, w), EaddL (v, u, 0);
    return ;
}
int dep [N], Erst [N];
int S, T;
int n;
int BFS () {
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i) {
        dep [i] = 0;
        Erst [i] = Eead [i];
    }
    dep [S] = 1;
    queue <int> q; 
    q .push (S);
    while (! q .empty ()) {
        int u = q .front ();
        q .pop ();
        for (int i = Erst [u]; i; i = Ext [i]) {
            if (Ew [i] && ! dep [Ev [i]]) {
                dep [Ev [i]] = dep [u] + 1;
                q .push (Ev [i]);
                if (Ev [i] == T) {
                    return 1;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
int dinic (int u, int flow) {
    if (u == T) {
        return flow;
    }
    int rest = flow;
    for (int i = Erst [u]; i && rest; i = Ext [i]) {
        Erst [u] = i;
        if (Ew [i] && dep [u] + 1 == dep [Ev [i]]) {
            int k = dinic (Ev [i], min (Ew [i], rest));
            if (! k) {
                dep [Ev [i]] = 0;
            }
            rest -= k, Ew [i] -= k, Ew [i ^ 1] += k;
        }
    }
    return flow - rest;
}
const int F = 1000 + 10;
int an, am;
int id [F] [F];
int a [F];
int w [F] [F];
int main () {
    scanf ("%d %d", & an, & am);
    n = 1000;
    for (int i = 1; i <= an; ++ i) {
    	for (int j = i; j <= an; ++ j) {
    		++ n, id [i] [j] = n;
    	}
    }
    S = n + 1, T = n + 2;
    n += 2;
    for (int i = 1; i <= an; ++ i) {
    	scanf ("%d", & a [i]);
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= an; ++ i) {
    	for (int j = i; j <= an; ++ j) {
    		scanf ("%d", & w [i] [j]);
    	}
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= 1000; ++ i) {
    	Eadd (S, i, 0), Eadd (i, T, am * i * i);
    }
    int ans = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= an; ++ i) {
    	for (int j = i; j <= an; ++ j) {
    		if (i == j) {
    			w [i] [j] -= a [i];
    		}
    		if (w [i] [j] >= 0) {
    			ans += w [i] [j];
    			Eadd (S, id [i] [j], w [i] [j]), Eadd (id [i] [j], T, 0);
    		}
    		else {
    			Eadd (S, id [i] [j], 0), Eadd (id [i] [j], T, - w [i] [j]);
    		}
    		if (i < j) {
    			Eadd (id [i] [j], id [i + 1] [j], inf), Eadd (id [i] [j], id [i] [j - 1], inf);
    		}
    		else {
    			Eadd (id [i] [j], a [i], inf);
    		}
    	}
    }
    while (BFS ()) {
    	int flow;
    	while ((flow = dinic (S, inf))) {
    		ans -= flow;
    	}
    }
    printf ("%d", ans);
    return 0;
}

entry.title: LibreOJ 2384 「HNOI2013」切糕
entry.content:
LibreOJ 2384 「HNOI2013」切糕

发现是分成两半，考虑最小割。

令对于 1≤i≤P,1≤j≤Q1\le i\le P, 1\le j\le Q1≤i≤P,1≤j≤Q 的点 (i,j)(i,j)(i,j)，其切割点为 fi,jf_{i, j}fi,j​

考虑限制 1⁡\operatorname {1}1，即对于 1≤i≤P,1≤j≤Q1\le i\le P, 1\le j\le Q1≤i≤P,1≤j≤Q 的点 (i,j)(i,j)(i,j)，只有一个 fi,jf_{i, j}fi,j​ 的情况
对于 1≤i≤P,1≤j≤Q1\le i\le P, 1\le j\le Q1≤i≤P,1≤j≤Q 的点 (i,j)(i, j)(i,j) 建 R−1R - 1R−1 个点 si,j,1∼R−1s_{i, j, 1\sim R - 1}si,j,1∼R−1​，令 si,j,0=S⁡,si,j,R=T⁡s_{i, j, 0} = \operatorname {S}, s_{i, j, R} = \operatorname{T}si,j,0​=S,si,j,R​=T
对节点进行连边形成一条链，即对于 1≤k≤R1\le k\le R1≤k≤R，连边 (si,j,k−1,si,j,k,vi,j,k)(s_{i, j, k - 1}, s_{i, j, k}, v_{i, j, k})(si,j,k−1​,si,j,k​,vi,j,k​)，若这条边被割掉了则说明 fi,j=kf _ {i, j} = kfi,j​=k
进一步发现可能会有一条链割掉多条边的情况，对于这种情况，同样对于 1≤k≤R1\le k\le R1≤k≤R，连边 (si,j,k,si,j,k−1,inf⁡)(s_{i, j, k}, s_{i, j, k - 1}, \operatorname {inf})(si,j,k​,si,j,k−1​,inf)
证明考虑从最小割定义入手，对于正常的状态 SSTT⁡\operatorname {SSTT}SSTT，这条链上则肯定会有 STST⁡\operatorname {STST}STST 这样的状态，答案多一个 inf⁡\operatorname {inf}inf 一定不优

考虑限制 2⁡\operatorname {2}2，即对于 1≤i,u≤P,1≤j,v≤Q,∣i−u∣+∣j−v∣=11\le i, u\le P, 1\le j, v\le Q, |i - u| + |j - v| = 11≤i,u≤P,1≤j,v≤Q,∣i−u∣+∣j−v∣=1 的点 (i,j),(u,v)(i,j), (u, v)(i,j),(u,v)，满足 ∣fi,j−fu,v∣≤d|f_{i, j} - f_{u, v}| \le d∣fi,j​−fu,v​∣≤d
拆开绝对值，得到两个式子 fi,j−fu,v,fu,v−fi,j≤df_{i, j} - f_{u, v}, f_{u, v} - f_{i, j} \le dfi,j​−fu,v​,fu,v​−fi,j​≤d
于是可以对于 d≤k≤Rd\le k\le Rd≤k≤R，连边 (si,j,k,su,v,k−d,inf⁡)(s_{i, j, k}, s_{u, v, k - d}, \operatorname{inf})(si,j,k​,su,v,k−d​,inf)
证明依然考虑最小割定义，如果 ∣fi,j−fu,v∣>d|f_{i, j} - f_{u, v}| > d∣fi,j​−fu,v​∣>d，假设 fi,j>fu,vf_{i, j} > f_{u, v}fi,j​>fu,v​，则一定满足 fi,j−d>fu,v⇒fi,j−1−d≥fu,vf_{i, j} - d > f_{u, v} \Rightarrow f_{i, j} - 1 - d \ge f_{u, v}fi,j​−d>fu,v​⇒fi,j​−1−d≥fu,v​，此时 (i,j,fi,j−1)(i, j, f_{i, j} - 1)(i,j,fi,j​−1) 状态为 S⁡\operatorname {S}S，(u,v,fi,j−d)(u, v, f_{i, j} - d)(u,v,fi,j​−d) 状态为 TTT，答案多一个 inf⁡\operatorname {inf}inf 一定不优

# include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int inf = 1e8;
const int N = 64000 + 10, M = 384000 + 10;
int Ev [M * 2], Ext [M * 2], Ew [M * 2];
int Eead [N];
int Etot = 1;
void EaddL (int u, int v, int w) {
    Ev [++ Etot] = v, Ew [Etot] = w, Ext [Etot] = Eead [u], Eead [u] = Etot;
    return ;
}
void Eadd (int u, int v, int w) {
    EaddL (u, v, w), EaddL (v, u, 0);
    return ;
}
int dep [N], Erst [N];
int S, T;
int n;
int BFS () {
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i) {
        dep [i] = 0;
        Erst [i] = Eead [i];
    }
    dep [S] = 1;
    queue <int> q; 
    q .push (S);
    while (! q .empty ()) {
        int u = q .front ();
        q .pop ();
        for (int i = Erst [u]; i; i = Ext [i]) {
            if (Ew [i] && ! dep [Ev [i]]) {
                dep [Ev [i]] = dep [u] + 1;
                q .push (Ev [i]);
                if (Ev [i] == T) {
                    return 1;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
int dinic (int u, int flow) {
    if (u == T) {
        return flow;
    }
    int rest = flow;
    for (int i = Erst [u]; i && rest; i = Ext [i]) {
        Erst [u] = i;
        if (Ew [i] && dep [u] + 1 == dep [Ev [i]]) {
            int k = dinic (Ev [i], min (Ew [i], rest));
            if (! k) {
                dep [Ev [i]] = 0;
            }
            rest -= k, Ew [i] -= k, Ew [i ^ 1] += k;
        }
    }
    return flow - rest;
}
const int F = 40 + 5;
int P, Q, R, D;
int v [F] [F] [F];
int s [F] [F] [F];
const int dx [4] = {0, 0, 1, - 1}, dy [4] = {1, - 1, 0, 0};
int main () {
    scanf ("%d %d %d\n%d", & P, & Q, & R, & D);
    for (int i = 1; i <= R; ++ i) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= P; ++ j) {
            for (int k = 1; k <= Q; ++ k) {
                scanf ("%d", & v [j] [k] [i]);
            }
        }
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= P; ++ i) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= Q; ++ j) {
            for (int k = 1; k < R; ++ k) {
                ++ n, s [i] [j] [k] = n;
            }
        }
    }
    S = n + 1, T = n + 2;
    n += 2;
    for (int i = 1; i <= P; ++ i) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= Q; ++ j) {
            s [i] [j] [0] = S, s [i] [j] [R] = T;
        }
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= P; ++ i) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= Q; ++ j) {
            for (int k = 1; k <= R; ++ k) {
                int x = s [i] [j] [k - 1], y = s [i] [j] [k];
                Eadd (x, y, v [i] [j] [k]), Eadd (y, x, inf);
            }
        }
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= P; ++ i) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= Q; ++ j) {
            for (int p = 0; p < 4; ++ p) {
                int u = i + dx [p], v = j + dy [p];
                if (u < 1 || v < 1 || u > P || v > Q) {
                    continue;
                }
                for (int k = D; k <= R; ++ k) {
                    Eadd (s [i] [j] [k], s [u] [v] [k - D], inf);
                }
            }
        }
    }
    int ans = 0;
    while (BFS ()) {
        int flow;
        while ((flow = dinic (S, inf))) {
            ans += flow;
        }
    }
    printf ("%d", ans);
    return 0;
}

entry.title: 关于 lhzawa
entry.content:

entry.title: LibreOJ 6008 「网络流 24 题」餐巾计划
entry.content:
LibreOJ 6008 「网络流 24 题」餐巾计划

费用最小，联想到最小费用最大流

对于 1≤i≤n1\le i\le n1≤i≤n 的第 iii 天，建 222 个节点 xi,yix_i, y_ixi​,yi​，xix_ixi​ 代表新餐巾，yiy_iyi​ 代表旧餐巾

情况 1⁡\operatorname {1}1，每天用 rir_iri​ 块新餐巾
转化为每天减少 rir_iri​ 块新餐巾，增加 rir_iri​ 块旧餐巾
对于 1≤i≤n1\le i\le n1≤i≤n，连边 (xi,T⁡,ri,0),(S⁡,yi,ri,0)(x_i, \operatorname {T}, r_i, 0),(\operatorname {S}, y_i, r_i, 0)(xi​,T,ri​,0),(S,yi​,ri​,0)

情况 2⁡\operatorname {2}2，购买新餐巾
对于 1≤i≤n1\le i\le n1≤i≤n，连边 (S⁡,xi,inf⁡,P)(\operatorname {S}, x_i, \operatorname {inf}, P)(S,xi​,inf,P)

情况 3⁡\operatorname {3}3，使用快洗或慢洗
由当前该天的旧餐巾连向 MMM 或 NNN 天后的新餐巾
对于 1≤i≤n−M1\le i\le n - M1≤i≤n−M，连边 (yi,xi+M,inf⁡,F)(y_i, x_{i + M}, \operatorname {inf}, F)(yi​,xi+M​,inf,F)
对于 1≤j≤n−N1\le j\le n - N1≤j≤n−N，连边 (yi,xi+N,inf⁡,S)(y_i, x_{i + N}, \operatorname {inf}, S)(yi​,xi+N​,inf,S)

情况 4⁡\operatorname {4}4，新毛巾存至下一天
则下一天新毛巾加上该天的新毛巾，对于 1≤i<n1\le i < n1≤i<n，连边 (xi,xi+1,inf⁡,0)(x_i, x_{i + 1}, \operatorname {inf}, 0)(xi​,xi+1​,inf,0)

# include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int inf = INT_MAX;
const int N = 2e3 + 10, M = 6e4 + 10;
int Ev [M * 2], Ext [M * 2], Ew [M * 2], Ec [M * 2], Eead [N];
int Etot = 1;
void EaddL (int u, int v, int w, int c) {
	++ Etot, Ev [Etot] = v, Ew [Etot] = w, Ec [Etot] = c, Ext [Etot] = Eead [u], Eead [u] = Etot;
	return ;
}
void Eadd (int u, int v, int w, int c) {
	EaddL (u, v, w, c), EaddL (v, u, 0, - c);
	return ;
}
int Erst [N], dis [N], vis [N];
int S, T, n;
int SPFA () {
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i) {
		dis [i] = inf, vis [i] = 0, Erst [i] = Eead [i];
	}
	dis [S] = 0, vis [S] = 1;
	queue <int> q; 
	q .push (S);
	while (! q .empty ()) {
		int u = q .front ();
		q .pop ();
		vis [u] = 0;
		for (int i = Erst [u]; i; i = Ext [i]) {
			int v = Ev [i], w = Ew [i], c = Ec [i];
			if (w && dis [u] + c < dis [v]) {
				dis [v] = dis [u] + c;
				if (! vis [v]) {
					vis [v] = 1;
					q .push (v);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return dis [T] < inf;
}
int allcost;
int Dinic (int u, int flow) {
	if (u == T) {
		return flow;
	}
	int rest = flow;
	vis [u] = 1;
	for (int i = Erst [u]; i && rest; i = Ext [i]) {
		Erst [u] = i;
		int v = Ev [i],  w = Ew [i], c = Ec [i];
		if (! vis [v] && w && dis [u] + c == dis [v]) {
			int k = Dinic (v, min (w, rest));
			if (! k) {
				dis [v] = inf;
			}
			allcost += k * c, rest -= k, Ew [i] -= k, Ew [i ^ 1] += k;
		}
	}
	vis [u] = 0;
	return flow - rest;
}
const int AN = 1e3 + 10;
int r [AN];
int main () {
	int an, aP, aM, aF, aN, aS;
	scanf ("%d %d %d %d %d %d", & an, & aP, & aM, & aF, & aN, & aS);
	for (int i = 1; i <= an; ++ i) {
		scanf ("%d", & r [i]);
	}
	S = an * 2 + 1, T = n = an * 2 + 2;
	for (int i = 1; i <= an; ++ i) {
		if (i < an) {
			Eadd (i, i + 1, inf, 0);
		}
		Eadd (S, i, inf, aP);
		Eadd (i, T, r [i], 0);
		Eadd (S, i + an, r [i], 0);
		if (i + aM <= an) {
			Eadd (i + an, i + aM, inf, aF);
		}
		if (i + aN <= an) {
			Eadd (i + an, i + aN, inf, aS);
		}
	}
	while (SPFA ()) {
		int flow;
		while ((flow = Dinic (S, inf)));
	}
	printf ("%d", allcost);
	return 0;
}

entry.title: Luogu P3980 [NOI2008] 志愿者招募
entry.content:
Luogu P3980 [NOI2008] 志愿者招募

不好从跑最小费用最大流入手，那就从构造最小费用最大流入手

首先构造最大流为 inf⁡\operatorname {inf}inf
建 n+1n + 1n+1 个点 0∼n0\sim n0∼n，对于 0≤i<n0\le i < n0≤i<n，代表从 iii 号点流向 i+1i + 1i+1 号点
连边 (S⁡,0,inf⁡,0),(n,T⁡,inf⁡,0)(\operatorname {S}, 0, \operatorname {inf}, 0), (n, \operatorname {T}, \operatorname {inf}, 0)(S,0,inf,0),(n,T,inf,0)，保证最大流跑出来肯定是 inf⁡\operatorname {inf}inf
接下来处理对于 1≤i≤n1\le i\le n1≤i≤n 的 iii 号点至少被 aia_iai​ 个区间覆盖的问题，那考虑让 inf⁡−ai\operatorname {inf} - a_iinf−ai​ 的流量可以 000 花费流过去，剩下的则必须通过购买区间流过去，连边 (i−1,i,inf⁡−ai)(i - 1, i, \operatorname {inf} - a_i)(i−1,i,inf−ai​)
最后来考虑购买区间的问题，那相当于对于 1≤i≤m1\le i\le m1≤i≤m，花费 cic_ici​ 直接跳过 [si,ti][s_i, t_i][si​,ti​]，连边 (si−1,ti,inf⁡,ci)(s_i - 1, t_i, \operatorname {inf}, c_i)(si​−1,ti​,inf,ci​)，需要注意的是因为点的定义，sis_isi​ 会 −1- 1−1，而 tit_iti​ 不会

# include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int inf = 1e9;
const int N = 1e3 + 10, M = 2e4 + 10;
int Ev [M * 2], Ext [M * 2], Ew [M * 2], Ec [M * 2], Eead [N];
int Etot = 1;
void EaddL (int u, int v, int w, int c) {
	++ Etot, Ev [Etot] = v, Ew [Etot] = w, Ec [Etot] = c, Ext [Etot] = Eead [u], Eead [u] = Etot;
	return ;
}
void Eadd (int u, int v, int w, int c) {
	EaddL (u, v, w, c), EaddL (v, u, 0, - c);
	return ;
}
int Erst [N], dis [N], vis [N];
int S, T, n;
int SPFA () {
	for (int i = 0; i <= n; ++ i) {
		dis [i] = inf, vis [i] = 0, Erst [i] = Eead [i];
	}
	dis [S] = 0, vis [S] = 1;
	queue <int> q; 
	q .push (S);
	while (! q .empty ()) {
		int u = q .front ();
		q .pop ();
		vis [u] = 0;
		for (int i = Erst [u]; i; i = Ext [i]) {
			int v = Ev [i], w = Ew [i], c = Ec [i];
			if (w && dis [u] + c < dis [v]) {
				dis [v] = dis [u] + c;
				if (! vis [v]) {
					vis [v] = 1;
					q .push (v);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return dis [T] < inf;
}
int allcost;
int Dinic (int u, int flow) {
	if (u == T) {
		return flow;
	}
	int rest = flow;
	vis [u] = 1;
	for (int i = Erst [u]; i && rest; i = Ext [i]) {
		Erst [u] = i;
		int v = Ev [i],  w = Ew [i], c = Ec [i];
		if (! vis [v] && w && dis [u] + c == dis [v]) {
			int k = Dinic (v, min (w, rest));
			if (! k) {
				dis [v] = inf;
			}
			allcost += k * c, rest -= k, Ew [i] -= k, Ew [i ^ 1] += k;
		}
	}
	vis [u] = 0;
	return flow - rest;
}
const int F1 = 1e3 + 10, F2 = 1e4 + 10;
int a [F1];
int s [F2], t [F2], c [F2];
int main () {
	int an, am;
	scanf ("%d %d", & an, & am);
	S = an + 1, T = n = an + 2;
	for (int i = 1; i <= an; ++ i) {
		scanf ("%d", & a [i]);
	}
	for (int i = 1; i <= am; ++ i) {
		scanf ("%d %d %d", & s [i], & t [i], & c [i]);
	}
	Eadd (S, 0, inf, 0), Eadd (an, T, inf, 0);
	for (int i = 1; i <= an; ++ i) {
		Eadd (i - 1, i, inf - a [i], 0);
	}
	for (int i = 1; i <= am; ++ i) {
		Eadd (s [i] - 1, t [i], inf, c [i]);
	}
	while (SPFA ()) {
		int flow;
		while ((flow = Dinic (S, inf)));
	}
	printf ("%d", allcost);
	return 0;
}
